page.title: 12Church and Chapel-Biddestone
page.content: The Parish Church of St.Nicholas has a regular congregation of between 15 and 40 people.They are mainly elderly with very few young adults. A Fish club is held for the 3-7 year olds. Communion is celebrated on Sunday morning and Evensong each Sunday evening. The church is fairly traditional in its use of Rite B or Series 2. The Rector is responsible for a number of parishes. The Church has links with Uganda and provides financial support several charities. The Parochial Church Council meets 4 or 5 times a year and in 1985 has discussed falling numbers of clergy, the appeal to repair the Lych-gate, the felling of yew-trees, new hymn books and special services. A Methodist chapel has a small faithful congregation. There are also Quakers,Catholics,Jehovah's Witnesses
